functions.name: setTabValue
functions.description: Store a key/value pair associated with a given tab.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: ID of the tab with which you want to associate the data. Error is thrown if ID is invalid.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key that you can later use to retrieve this particular data value.

functions.name: getTabValue
functions.description: Retrieve a previously stored value for a given tab, given its key.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: ID of the tab whose data you are trying to retrieve. Error is thrown if ID is invalid.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key identifying the particular value to retrieve.

functions.name: removeTabValue
functions.description: Remove a key/value pair from a given tab.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: ID of the tab whose data you are trying to remove. Error is thrown if ID is invalid.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key identifying the particular value to remove.
